channel.title: Projects on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Miss Vidhyalakshmi Parthasarathy

item.title: Project 1: Credit Risk Assessment FinTech Framework
item.description: This project represents the credit risk assessment dual framework of predicting credit scores and the forecasts of credit default risk of the consumers of the financial institutions like commercial banks and the lending firms. The implementation is dealt that mimics the real-world FICO Scoring Model with the custom enhancements to include lender’s internal credit risk factors by proposing a new Domain-Tech Feature Selection Approach along with Deep Learning and Transfer Learning techniques.

item.title: Project 2: Bank Customers Churn Prediction
item.description: This project deals with the classification of the bank customers on whether a customer will leave the bank (i.e.; churn) or not. As part of this project; below steps of a Data Science Project Life-Cycle is being implemented. Data Exploration, Analysis and Visualisations Data Pre-processing Data Preparation for the Modelling Model Training Model Validation Optimized Model Selection based on Various Performance Metrics Deploying the Best Optimized Model into Unseen Test Data Evaluating the Optimized Modelâ€™s Performance Metrics The business case and the problem statement to determine the churn status of the bank customers are explored, trained and validated on 7 different classification algorithms/models as listed below and the best finalized optimized model is selected based on the various performance metrics namely accuracy, precision, recall and f1-score.

item.title: Project 3: Content Management Web System With PostgreSQL Database, APIs and Cloud Deployment
item.description: This project repository includes a Web-based Content (Articles) Management System/Application related to Data Science Learning and Career Journey with User Registration, Login functionalities using Python, Flask Web Framework, HTML, PostgreSQL database and Heroku Cloud Server. This application is implemented and deployed in Heroku Cloud Server. The application functionalities include below: New User Registration (First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Gender, Language, Password) Existing User Login User Management (Modify/Edit Existing User Details and Delete Existing User) New Article/Content Creation View and Retrieve list of Users and the Articles References - covering various public website links External References - covering mathematical functions for quick references This application includes REST APIs implementation and cloud based functionalities covering below:

item.title: Project 4: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and Data Cleaning of Spark Fund Investments
item.description: This project deals with the Exploratory Data Analysis and the Data Cleaning of the various Companies Data for Spark Fund Investment, along with the Profiling Report. Tools & Technologies: Python, GitHub Link to Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 5: Tableau Dashboard - Financial Consumer Compliants
item.description: This project includes the data analysis related to financial consumer complaints using Tableau Desktop and results are visualized in the form of a Tableau Dashboard. Tools & Technologies: Tableau Desktop, Tableau Prep, GitHub Link to Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 6: Tableau Dashboard - Stock Market Status Summary
item.description: This project includes the data analysis related to stock market data using Tableau Desktop and results are visualized in the form of a Tableau Dashboard. Tools & Technologies: Tableau Desktop, Tableau Prep, GitHub Link to Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 7: Tableau Dashboard - Capital Markets Stocks Trade Transactions
item.description: This project includes the data analysis related to the capital stock market trade transactions data using Tableau Desktop and results are visualized in the form of a Dynamic Tableau Dashboard. Tools & Technologies: Tableau Desktop, Tableau Prep, GitHub Link to Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 8: Audio Digits Classification using Convolutional Neural Network
item.description: The project cover the basic solution and the Advanced Solution as given below based on Audio Feature Extraction Method named “Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients (MFCC)” and Deep Learning Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). Basic Solution: Includes designing, building, training, validation and testing a model created to recognise numerals from 0 to 9 in the audio files. Advanced Solution: Includes implementing the solution to predict the numeral based on a new audio test file.

item.title: Project 9: Python Data Analysis
item.description: This project deals with the Exploratory Data Analysis of the Pokemon Data using Python Pandas Library. Tools & Technologies: Python, GitHub Link to Project’s GitHub Repository
